replies.author: 末影矿工
replies.txt_content:
标题: My Adventrue                                          Myjourney
Ona dark and stormy day. You are walking in a dark forest, the treesare very tall with many giant spiders. You are afraid so you begin torun. Then you com to a large house. Everything is so quiet. The doorof the house is open, you can hear somebody is crying, but you cannotsee anybody around you. So you run away because you are scared. Thenyou come to a wooden bridge, there is a lava river under the bridge.The sky is turning red. You cross the river and come to an island,the dirt on the island is black and hot, there is a large castle onthe island. It is very tall. You walk into the castle and then thecastle starts to shake, it is like an earthquake. Then you come tothe top of the castle. You feel very hot,and suddenly a big fireballfalls from the sky. After that you see a giantic fire dragon, it istrying to burn you. You find a sword. You fight with the dragon andkill it. Then you go down and see the castle blowing up, you runhome. When you get home, you see the sunset. What an excitingadventure!
